application/json.example:
[
    {
        "groupName": "Sign Up form fields",
        "fields": [
            {
                "fieldName": "firstName",
                "labelKey": "First Name",
                "fieldType": "text",
                "validationRegex": "^[a-zA-Z]+(?: [a-zA-Z]+)*$",
                "isMandatory": true,
                "placeholder": "Please enter your first name",
                "errorMsg": "Name should contains alphabets and space only"
            },
            {
                "fieldName": "lastName",
                "labelKey": "Last Name",
                "fieldType": "text",
                "validationRegex": "^[a-zA-Z]+(?: [a-zA-Z]+)*$",
                "isMandatory": true,
                "placeholder": "Please enter your last name",
                "errorMsg": "Name should contains alphabets and space only"
            },
            {
                "fieldName": "email",
                "labelKey": "Email",
                "fieldType": "text",
                "validationRegex": "^[A-Za-z0-9_!#$%&'*+\/=?`{|}~^.-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+$",
                "isMandatory": true,
                "placeholder": "Please enter your email address",
                "errorMsg": "Invalid email address"
            },
            {
                "fieldName": "password",
                "labelKey": "Password",
                "fieldType": "password",
                "validationRegex": "^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[!@#$%^&*])[a-zA-Z0-9!@#$%^&*]{6,16}$",
                "isMandatory": true,
                "placeholder": "Please enter your password",
                "errorMsg": "Password should contains alphabets, one number and one special character and a length of 6-16"
            },
            {
                "fieldName": "confirmPassword",
                "labelKey": "Confirm Password",
                "fieldType": "password",
                "validationRegex": "^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[!@#$%^&*])[a-zA-Z0-9!@#$%^&*]{6,16}$",
                "isMandatory": true,
                "placeholder": "Please re-enter your password",
                "errorMsg": "Password should contains alphabets, one number and one special character and a length of 6-16"
            }
        ]
    }
]
